actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend 36 United States Code section 10 to define the Star Spangled Banner.

summary.text: Declares that the "Star Spangled Banner" consists of the words and music as composed by Francis Scott Key and arranged by Thomas Carr.

titles.title: A bill to amend 36 United States Code section 10 to define the Star Spangled Banner.
